author: Ran Li
name: Connor Rothschild Scrolly Demo
desc: Reproduction of Connor Rothschild's (Moksha Data Studio)'s demo use case of Russel's <Scrolly/> svelte component; explaination can of code can be found here: https://www.connorrothschild.com/post/svelte-scrollytelling.

author: Ran Li
name: Ran first scrolly
desc: Basic scrolly utilizing @puddingViz Scrolly component step detection, tweened values for data transitions and basic outputs to show scrolling progress.

author: Ran Li
name: Tweened Scatter
desc: Figuring out to how to tween a two dimensional data structure. This is a key component in developing tweened scatter plots.

author: Ran Li
name: Basic Vaccination Scrolly
desc: This is to adapt Connor's guide to a ChatGPT prompted scrolly. The goal is to learn put together a basic prompt and utilize the scrolly component, D3 scales and tweened values to create a scrolly that shows the effect of vaccination on a fictional disease. Note this is basic scrolly without best practices e.g. responsiveness.
